name: Stephanie and the Kidnapped Princess
description:
Rescue Princess Renee from an evil queen and win her castle back!!!

A little princess name Renee has been kidnapped by an evil queen and she has taken over her castle. Stephanie and her best friend Kendall join together once again to defeat the evil queen and rescue princess Renee. Play through a forest, a cave, a house and even underwater.

Presenting 6 new levels

Stephanie can double jump while Kendall can do wall jumps.

Gamepad and keyboard compatible.

X-Station Controller

D-Pad = Move left or right/ Duck down

A Button = Jump/Double Jump/Wall Jump/Swim

RT = Reset the game

LT = End the game

Keyboard

Arrows = move left or right/ duck down

X Key = jump/double jump/wall jump

Spacebar = Reset the game

ESC = End the game
